name: Supernatural Gun
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys game jam 2022.1. The theme was "It is not real". The Objective of the game is to kill all enemies in the level

Hello Everyone. I'm gonna continue developing this game. Because I am not satisfied with it. Many aspects of the game were rushed because of the diedline. I might add more levels and enemy types to the game. So if you're interested follow me on twitter. I'll post more updates there.
